name: Bug Spreader
description:
Bug Spreader

You're a bug creature leading the bugs to invade the world.

Spread as many bugs on the houses as you can, and destroy them. For every bug you send to a house, you gain 1 point. Each house takes 10 bugs to destroy. If you leave a house behind, you lose 30 points; If you run out of points, you lose. Try and see how long you can last!

(Early Prototype, made in 3 days for Mini Jam 78: Bugs)

 

 Small update (20/04): Just added a Windows download. (Edit: I didn't realize it was the debug version, should be fixed now)

OBS.: Both this and the HTML version are still the jam version of the game.

 

Controls
  • Aim: Mouse
  • Shoot: Left Click
Credits

Made by Cearaj

Assets used: Squitch sound sample and background noise from freesound.org
